name: postcss-fontsize

0.0.1.name: postcss-fontsize
0.0.1.description: This PostCSS plugin generates REM based font-size and line-height for every fontsize declaration. The line-height will be 1.5 times the fontsize value. A fallback pixel based font-size and line-height is also generated.
